title: Declare Many Variables
text:
To declare more than one variable of the same type, 
use a comma-separated list:

Example

  int x = 5, y = 6, z = 50;cout << 
  x + y + z;
Try it Yourself »

examples.heading: Example
examples.code:
int x = 5, y = 6, z = 50;cout << 
  x + y + z;

title: One Value to Multiple Variables
text: You can also assign the same value to multiple variables in one line:

examples.heading: Example
examples.code: int x, y, z;x = y = z = 50;cout << x + y + z;
